nodes.text: Skirmish in the Shock Drum facility

During the crisis involving the Sith Lord Darth Angral and stolen Republic superweapons in the Cold War with the Sith Empire, a battle occurred in the Shock Drum facility on the planet Tatooine. After the facility's defenses were destroyed in a previous attack, the native Tusken Raiders attacked the compound until a young Jedi Knight arrived and drove them off.
